problem_data.title: License Key Formatting
problem_data.description:
You are given a license key represented as a string s that consists of only alphanumeric characters and dashes. The string is separated into n + 1 groups by n dashes. You are also given an integer k.

We want to reformat the string s such that each group contains exactly k characters, except for the first group, which could be shorter than k but still must contain at least one character. Furthermore, there must be a dash inserted between two groups, and you should convert all lowercase letters to uppercase.

Return the reformatted license key.

examples.explanation:
The string s has been split into two parts, each part has 4 characters.
Note that the two extra dashes are not needed and can be removed.
The string s has been split into three parts, each part has 2 characters except the first part as it could be shorter as mentioned above.

experiment_result.runlog:
[測試#1] ❌ 失敗
  標準輸入: licenseKeyFormatting('2-5g-3-J', 2)
  標準輸出: '2-5G-3J\n'
  你的輸出: '2-5G-3J'

[測試#2] ❌ 失敗
  標準輸入: licenseKeyFormatting('abc-def-ghi', 3)
  標準輸出: 'ABC-DEF-GHI\n'
  你的輸出: 'ABC-DEF-GHI'

[測試#3] ❌ 失敗
  標準輸入: licenseKeyFormatting('', 3)
  標準輸出: '\n'
  你的輸出: ''

[測試#4] ❌ 失敗
  標準輸入: licenseKeyFormatting('abc-123', 10)
  標準輸出: 'ABC123\n'
  你的輸出: 'ABC123'

[測試#5] ❌ 失敗
  標準輸入: licenseKeyFormatting('a-b-c', 1)
  標準輸出: 'A-B-C\n'
  你的輸出: 'A-B-C'

[測試#6] ❌ 失敗
  標準輸入: licenseKeyFormatting('---', 3)
  標準輸出: '\n'
  你的輸出: ''

[測試#7] ❌ 失敗
  標準輸入: licenseKeyFormatting('a1-2b-3c', 2)
  標準輸出: 'A1-2B-3C\n'
  你的輸出: 'A1-2B-3C'

[測試#8] ❌ 失敗
  標準輸入: licenseKeyFormatting('abcd', 2)
  標準輸出: 'AB-CD\n'
  你的輸出: 'AB-CD'

=== 測試完成 (0/8) ===
